description_for_human: Add, get, update, delete CRM records using Salesforce, or send test emails.
description_for_model: Plugin for managing CRM-style records (contact, account, lead) through Salesforce Apex REST. Use POST /add-record to create, POST /update-record to update, POST /delete-record to delete, POST /get-records to retrieve records, and POST /send-email to send test emails. All operations require 'tablename'. Use 'action' key to specify the operation when needed.
